subject: Emirates National Bonded War
body:
Emirates National Bonded Warehouse Bank of Dubai
Baniyas Square, Deira,
Dubai, United Arab Emirates
I have been mandated to inform you that your inheritance/contract fund of (Five Million Two Hundred Thousand Dollars) with our bank is due for release into your nominated bank account. The audit report given to us, shows that you have been going through hard times to see to the release of your funds, which has been delayed by some dubious officials. We therefore advise that you stop further communication with any correspondence outside this office.
Kindly give us your contact details such as full names, telephone number, address and email contact in order to process and send your funds without further delay.
 On behalf of:
Chief Executive Officer, Emirates Islamic
Emirates NBD (Islamic Bank Department)
Call / Whatsapp +971529353248; Fax: +971524883301
Yours Faithfully  
Dr. Edgar Prosper
MD, ENBD, Islamic Banking Department

subject: Re:   Emirates National Bonded War
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information regarding my contract fund with Emirates National Bonded Warehouse Bank of Dubai. However, before I provide any personal details, I would like to know more about the process and verification procedures involved in releasing the funds. Could you please explain how the funds will be transferred into my nominated bank account? Additionally, are there any fees or charges associated with this transaction?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Ethel

subject: Re: Emirates National Bonded War
body:
Dear Ethel,
Sorry For The Late Reply Due To We Have A Lot Of Assignment To Cover Up
For This New Year2024 Agenda, As Our Target Given To Us From Federal
Ministry Of Finance(FMOF) This Second Batch Is Yours Now This Is Your Last
Chance You Have To Receive Your
Entitlement Fund,   Please What We Need From You Is  For You To Follow Up
And Indicate Your
Willingness And Seriousness That You Are Ready And Capable To Receive Your
Fund From Our Office Which We Have Given A Lot Of People Hope And Made So
Many People Great Billionaires Today, As Much As Many People Have Received
Their Entitlement Fund From Us,
So How Do You Want To Receive Your Fund? We Are Going To Open Your
Transaction File Now Once We  Get Your Response Back,
We Have (3) Options Of Services, You Have To Listen Very Well Option (1)
You Will Receive Your Fund By ATM Card Send Direct To Your  Home Address
Doorstep,
 Option (2) You Will Receive Your Fund By Bank To Bank Wire Transfer Within
48hrs Your Fund Will Reflect And Hit To Your Nominated Bank Account There
In Your Country,
Option (3) You Will Receive Your Fund By D N I Cash Delivery By Red Cross
Non Inspection Cargo Unit Direct To Your Doorstep Without Any Story Or Any
Customs Inspection,
Any Of The Options You Choose We Have To Send You ATM Application Form To
Fill And Return It Back To Us For Our Official References,  Or Dollar
Account Opening  Form Which You Will Fill It And Return It Back To Us,
Regards,
Dr Richard Hong

subject: Re: Emirates National Bonded War
body:
Dear Dr. Richard Hong,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize for the delay in my response, as I have been quite busy with assignments lately. I appreciate the opportunity you are offering me to receive my fund from your office.

I am definitely interested in receiving my fund, but before proceeding, I would like to gather some more information about the options you mentioned. Could you please provide me with further details regarding each option? Specifically, I would like to know more about the process involved, any fees or charges that may be associated, and the estimated time it would take for me to receive the funds.

Additionally, could you please clarify what you mean by "ATM Form" and "Dollar Account Opening Form"? What information will be required on these forms?

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Ethel

subject: Re: Emirates National Bonded War

subject: Re: Emirates National Bonded War
body:
Dear Dr. Richard Hong,

Thank you for your response and for clarifying the different options for receiving the funds. I appreciate your patience in explaining it to me again.

I understand that there are two options: receiving the funds through an ATM card or through a bank wire transfer into my account. Could you please provide more information about each option? For example, how long does it take to receive the funds through an ATM card? And what is the process for receiving the funds through a bank wire transfer?

Also, could you please let me know what the submission fees are for each option? I want to make sure I have all the necessary information before making a decision.

Lastly, I would like to know how secure these methods are. Are there any risks involved in providing my personal information and copy of my passport or valid card?

Thank you once again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Ethel
